name: DailyNewsBrief
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The Daily News Brief skill provides you with the latest headlines and top stories from the world of technology. Stay informed about the latest trends, innovations, and updates in tech by adding this skill to your Flash Briefing. Simply say, "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?" or "Alexa, play my Flash Briefing," and receive a summary of the most important news of the day. The content is updated daily to ensure you never miss out on key developments.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
